    • Method Detail

      • createInstanceForComponent

        LoggingInterface createInstanceForComponent(java.lang.String componentId,
                                          java.lang.String componentVersion)
        Create instance for component logging interface. This method to be used by all component to get their respective logging
        Parameters:
        componentId - the base package name of component
        componentVersion - the component version
        Returns:
        the logging interface

      • log

        void log(LoggingInterface.LogLevel level,
       java.lang.String eventId,
       java.lang.String message)
        Logs message on console and file .
        Parameters:
        level - the level {VERBOSE, DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR}
        eventId - the Event name or Tag
        message - the message
